description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Content Management component in Oracle Database Server 10.1.0.5, 10.2.0.3, 10.2.0.4, and 11.1.0.7; and Oracle Enterprise Manager Grid Control 10.1.0.6, 10.2.0.5, and 11.1.0.1; allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via unknown vectors related to Scheduler.
